Text:
Why Sirius Sounds isn't a household name is beyond me!! This is a gem of an album and my eyes were shining as this hit the 100%..! Both my vinyl and cd were pinched from me a while back, so this time I'm gonna make 5 or 6 cds and keep 'em under lock and key! ;) A million thanks naba888, if that is still you.. May the bong be with you :))
..will keep seeding for a good while...
Thanks for this, I've been looking for this album in any format for a long time.  great stuff!
